hooks.command: file=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path'); if echo "$file" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx)$'; then cd "$(dirname "$file")" && npx prettier --write "$(basename "$file")" 2>/dev/null && npx eslint --fix "$file" 2>/dev/null || true; elif echo "$file" | grep -q '\.cs$'; then project=$(find "$(dirname "$file")" -maxdepth 5 -name "*.csproj" -print -quit 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$project" ]; then dotnet format "$project" --include "$file" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; elif echo "$file" | grep -q '\.md$'; then npx markdownlint-cli2 --fix "$file" 2>/dev/null || true; elif echo "$file" | grep -qE '\.(json|ya?ml)$' && ! echo "$file" | grep -qE '(package-lock|Development|Local)\.'; then npx prettier --write "$file" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
